originalText.text: My partner and I have been students of Andrea for more than six years. She is a dedicated, delightful and disciplined teacher. Whether it's grammar, vocabulary or just conversation, Andrea is incredibly organized, thorough and methodical. Her lessons are carefully built and very practical. But most importantly, she's great company, and we look forward to our lessons with her every single week. We tried other instructors, but Andrea is "la mejor."

text.text: My partner and I have been students of Andrea for more than six years. She is a dedicated, delightful and disciplined teacher. Whether it's grammar, vocabulary or just conversation, Andrea is incredibly organized, thorough and methodical. Her lessons are carefully built and very practical. But most importantly, she's great company, and we look forward to our lessons with her every single week. We tried other instructors, but Andrea is "la mejor."

originalText.text: Andrea is an excellent Spanish teacher who has a real commitment to ensuring that her students learn to speak and write properly. Her teaching is rigorous but also highly practical. She uses a mix of writing exercises, stories, conversations and translations to build vocabulary, understanding of spoken Spanish and the ability to “think in Spanish.” I started with Andrea as a total beginner and reached an intermediate level that allowed me to travel in Latin America and feel comfortable interacting with people 100% in Spanish. She teaches with enthusiasm and humor, and very closely tailors the work to the student’s abilities and specific needs. Finally, she is well organized and  reliable. I highly recommend Andrea for anyone interested in making real progress in learning Spanish!

originalText.text: Andrea is the best Spanish teacher you can find in NYC. I took Spanish lessons with Andrea for almost three and a half years, and by the time I was done I was comfortable using Spanish all the time in my everyday life. Andrea is always completely prepared, and comes with a lesson planned geared towards learning a new skills or addressing your weaknesses. She is always willing to talk through the nitty gritty grammar details that explain why Spanish works the way that it does. She also has great taste in the stories that she picks for you to read during her lessons. Finally, she's funny and fun, I always had a great time and often got a lot of practice just speaking to her about what was going on in my life (in Spanish of course!). I couldn't recommend her more. If you want to learn Spanish, pick Andrea!

originalText.text: Andrea is a great teacher. She is patient and makes the process of learning a new language both worthwhile and fun. Highly recommended.
